text: Hey there and welcome to module 3. In
this module, we're going to be showing
you how we can set up the coin
collectible for our platformer game.
That being said, we're going to be
taking the coin mesh. We're going to be
turning that into a blueprint, and then
we're going to be setting up all of the
logic that's going to be required to get
that coin being collected, disappearing
once it's collected, and most
importantly, adding to that counter.
Then lastly, what we're going to be
doing is creating a function that is
going to fire off once we've collected
all of the coins to tell the game that
it should load our game over screen.
Now, bear in mind, we're not going to be
building the game over screen just yet.
This module is all about the logic for
those coins, setting up the mesh, and
then setting up all of the code so that
when we do build that screen later on,
it's ready to go. This again is going to
be a very exciting module and I can't
wait to jump in with yourselves. Move on
to the next video to continue your
learning journey inside of Unreal
Engine. But as always, stay awesome,
keep creating.
